title: Random bugsplats during game
body: Last game two times the game bugsplatted. My connection was perfectly fine. how can i know it won't happen and what can i do in future games?

replies.body:
If this already happened a couple times back to back, it makes sense to think that it could happen again if we don't get this cleared up first. Bugsplats typically happen when the game/client crashes, but it can't quite figure out the main reason as to why it happened. Sometimes it's caused by corrupted game files, and other times it can be due to missing drivers or other programs running in the background. 

Hit up our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some of the more common ways to troubleshoot this, but definitely, let me know if that doesn't seem to help!
